idea-plugin.name: PercyEditor
idea-plugin.description:
Support for Percy

Getting Started

  • Load a directory containing YAML files following the Percy directory and file structure
  • Open a YAML file and switch to the "Percy Editor" tab.

Features

  • Define multiple environments in a special "environments.yaml" file
  • Reuse the defined environments in other YAML file in the same directory
  • Inherit properties from default environment in non-default environment
  • Support YAML property with object, bool, string, number and array types
  • Define variables at the top-level, and use the variables anywhere in the YAML file
  • View the compiled YAML of the environment node, in this view, the inherits and variables will be resolved
